description:
Our Kentucky law practice has served the people of Grayson for generations. In fact, Wilhoit Law Office has been the starting point for federal and district court judges. During this time, we have honed our skills as personal injury lawyers and remain committed to helping injured parties get justice and fair compensation.

Our Personal Injury Cases

Whether the incident in question led to your personal injury or the death of a loved one, we want to hear about your case. While we are primarily known for taking on car wreck cases, our law office also handles the following injury-related complaints:

• Aviation and mass transit accidents
• Plaintiff's complaint of assault and battery
• Medical malpractice
• Bad faith insurance
• Workers' compensation
• Wrongful death

Our Additional Civil Cases

Our office expanded its practice areas over the years to assist business owners with contract disputes and general business law. We also provide mediation services.

Why Choose Wilhoit Law Office

How much does a professional's experience matter to you when your recovery, health and finances are on the line? Our lead attorney, Mr. Wilhoit, has practiced law for decades. He has also dedicated 70% of the practice to litigation, making him a force to be reckoned with in the courtroom. Mr. Wilhoit is also well-versed in political science and business law; he taught both subjects at the Kentucky Christian University.
